Assembly Code:
lui x10, 1
lui x11, 2
addi x12, zero, 0
LOOP:
slti x13, x12, 20
beq x13, zero, END
add x10, x10, x11
addi x12, x12, 1
beq x0, x0, LOOP
END:
ebreak

Machine Code:
